stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Event Sequence Simulator
    [Education_ClassroomService] --> idle
    idle --> ready : LOAD [Education_ContentCDN]
    ready --> ready : LOAD
    simulating --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> simulating : START [Education_LMS_Portal]
    simulating --> simulating : DISPATCH
    simulating --> simulating : SET_CONTEXT
    simulating --> simulating : REFRESH
    simulating --> simulating : EVAL_GATES
    simulating --> simulating : FORK
    simulating --> simulating : SWITCH_FORK [Education_ClassroomService]
    simulating --> simulating : STEP_BACK [Education_GradeSync]
    simulating --> simulating : SET_SEQUENCE
    simulating --> simulating : RUN_SEQUENCE [Education_GradeSync]
    simulating --> simulating : FUZZ
    simulating --> simulating : FIND_PATH
    simulating --> simulating : EXPLORE
    simulating --> simulating : VIEW_TRACE
    simulating --> simulating : VIEW_SPACE [Education_GradeSync]
    simulating --> simulating : EXPORT [Education_LMS_Portal]
    simulating --> simulating : IMPORT [Education_StudentDB]
    simulating --> simulating : RESET
    simulating --> ready : STOP
    ready --> idle : UNLOAD
    simulating --> idle : UNLOAD

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 Education_ClassroomService 和 Education_ContentCDN 的逻辑。
不，其实叫 Education_ClassroomService处理 会更准确一点。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Education_ClassroomService处理'，对吧？
没问题。

对的，就这样。

extra.repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
